macro.name: DAEDCOM
macro.description: Use DCOM to connect to ISISICP

macro.name: DAEHOST
macro.description: If using DCOM, host to connect to

macro.name: LIVEVIEW_NELEMENTS
macro.description: Max num array elements in liveview (at least SizeX * SizeY)

macro.name: PRE_BEGIN_1
macro.description: PV to write to before executing BEGIN

macro.name: POST_BEGIN_1
macro.description: PV to write to after executing BEGIN

macro.name: PRE_END_1
macro.description: PV to write to before executing END

macro.name: POST_END_1
macro.description: PV to write to after executing END

macro.name: PRE_PAUSE_1
macro.description: PV to write to before executing PAUSE

macro.name: POST_PAUSE_1
macro.description: PV to write to after executing PAUSE

macro.name: PRE_RESUME_1
macro.description: PV to write to before executing RESUME

macro.name: POST_RESUME_1
macro.description: PV to write to after executing RESUME

macro.name: PRE_ABORT_1
macro.description: PV to write to before executing ABORT

macro.name: POST_ABORT_1
macro.description: PV to write to after executing ABOR
